row.process: ! ! Get environment information. ! :INC QA.INCLUDE.X.UC4.ADMIN.ENV ! ! This sets information to be used in relation to running any SQL jobs. ! It doesn't matter what database, this is information common to all ! the databases/SQL jobs. ! :SET &SQLHOST# = GET_VAR(SYSTEM.VARIABLE.X.UC4.X.ENV,SQLHOST) :PUT_ATT HOST = '&SQLHOST#' :PRINT 'Job will run on agent &SQLHOST#.'
